verse:
कुशलाचरितेनैषामिह स्वार्थो न विद्यते ।
विपर्ययेण वानर्थो निरहङ्कारिणां विभो ॥

terms.nirahaṅkāriṇām: who are free from false ego

vedabase.translation: My dear Prabhu, when these great persons who are free from false ego act piously in this world, they have no selfish motives to fulfill, and even when they act in apparent contradiction to the laws of piety, they are not subject to sinful reactions.

gpt.meaning: Meaning: O mighty one, for those who are devoid of ego and act virtuously, there is no self interest in this world. Their actions are not driven by personal gain. On the contrary, their actions are purposeful and free from any egoistic motivations.

bard.meaning: what indeed are all the beings on earth, in the atmosphere and in heaven, and also for the controller and for the controlled, the relations of good and bad actions
